BBC Sport
Borussia Dortmund have cleared Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang to have a medical at Arsenal but the deal is still not done.

The German transfer window closes at 1700 GMT tomorrow.

However, for transfers to a German club from overseas, that only applies to lodging contracts with the DFL.

The actual registration is done via Fifa and they have until 2300 GMT to complete that, so, in theory, a contract could be lodged for a transfer that never actually goes through.
